content.text: Match ends, Rubin Kazan 1, Barcelona 1.
Second Half ends, Rubin Kazan 1, Barcelona 1.
Attempt missed. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Lionel Messi with a through ball.
Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Gerard Piqué (Barcelona).
Vitaliy Kaleshin (Rubin Kazan) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Aleksandr Ryazantsev (Rubin Kazan) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Bojan (Barcelona).
Attempt missed. Bojan (Barcelona) header from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Lionel Messi with a cross following a corner.
Substitution, Rubin Kazan. Bibras Natcho replaces Christian Noboa.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Lasha Salukvadze.
Attempt blocked. Bojan (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Pedro.
Foul by César Navas (Rubin Kazan).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Obafemi Martins (Rubin Kazan) hits the right post with a header from the right side of the six yard box. Assisted by Vitaliy Kaleshin with a cross.
